attributes.title: sigh,,,
attributes.review:
a debate is not a debate if you arguments are backed by opinions. a debate is not a debate if your only arguments are insults. another four years means more destructive alt-right propaganda. this app only perpetuates it.

p.s. news? this is a news app? what?
